description: This file defines a mock class 'EdidParserMock' used for testing purposes in a hardware or device settings context. It mocks the 'edidParserImpl' interface methods 'EDID_Parse' and 'EDID_Verify' for unit testing.
external_methods: MOCK_METHOD(edid_parser::edid_status_e, EDID_Parse, (unsigned char* bytes, size_t count, edid_parser::edid_data_t* data_ptr), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(edid_parser::edid_status_e, EDID_Verify, (unsigned char* bytes, size_t count), (override))

classes.name: EdidParserMock
classes.description: A mock class inheriting from 'edid_parser::edidParserImpl' to facilitate unit testing of EDID parsing functionalities.

methods.name: ~EdidParserMock
methods.description: Destructor for the EdidParserMock class, defaulted.

methods.name: EDID_Parse
methods.description: Mocked method for parsing EDID data, overridden for testing.

methods.name: EDID_Verify
methods.description: Mocked method to verify EDID data, overridden for testing.
